headline: Is ServiceNow’s (NOW) New Emergency AI Partnership Quietly Reshaping Its Regulated-Industry Ambitions?
summary: In recent days, Everbridge, in collaboration with ServiceNow and Ekatra, launched the Emergency Event Management solution integrating Everbridge High Velocity CEM with the ServiceNow AI Platform to help critical infrastructure operators predict and respond to storms, wildfires, and other emergencies. The partnership expands ServiceNow’s AI-based workflow reach into utilities and other regulated sectors by tying together predictive intelligence, automated actions, and field...
